parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a COD AEP: 13240004. This is a valid CMF number, indicating that the post is related to electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post clearly refers to Petru Farago, a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies for the UDMR party.  The image prominently features his picture and explicitly states his position on the ballot ("POZIŢIA 1 pe buletinul de vot pentru CAMERA DEPUTATILOR"). This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The targeting data shows a broad reach across multiple cities in Arad County. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote Petru Farago's candidacy. By highlighting his position on the ballot and using his image, the post aims to influence voters to choose him. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks any form of news reporting, analysis, or opinion pieces. It's purely promotional material for a candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a direct endorsement of a candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2632021697008160</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Petru Farago), is used during the electoral campaign (although the end date is given as 1732867200, which corresponds to November 23, 2024, and the post was likely made before the end of the campaign), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Farago), and is not journalistic in nature. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's targeting data indicates it is intended for a wide audience.  There are no counterarguments to suggest this is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>PETRU FARAGO</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
SC KLING CONSULTING SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 2632021697008160) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura lui PETRU FARAGO pentru UDMR la Camera Deputaților, evidențiind poziția sa pe buletinul de vot și utilizând imaginea sa, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea acestuia. Postarea îndeplinește toate criteriile materialului de propagandă electorală conform art. 36 (7) din Legea nr. 334/2006, fiind clar identificabilă ca atare prin prezența codului CMF (COD AEP: 13240004) și prin conținutul său explicit.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
